Uses of Class
frc.team670.robot.utils.math.RigidTransform

  • Packages that use RigidTransform 
    Package Description
    frc.team670.robot.utils.math  

    • Uses of RigidTransform in frc.team670.robot.utils.math

      Methods in frc.team670.robot.utils.math that return RigidTransform 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static RigidTransform RigidTransform.exp(Twist twist)
      ethaneade.com/lie_groups.pdf Exponential map for 2D rigid transformation Basically this converts a Twist ---(exponential map)---> transformation Kind of like an differential position ---(integral)---> position
      static RigidTransform Kinematics.integrateForwardKinematics(RigidTransform currentPose, Twist deltaPos)
      Forward kinematics: Starting in the pose (x, y, theta) at time t, determine the pose at time t + delta_t (x', y', theta') given the robot's left and right wheel velocities.
      RigidTransform RigidTransform.transform(RigidTransform other)
      Transforms (rotates + translates) this transformation matrix by another transformation matrix Basically multiplies two transformation matrices (see above the class declaration) together.
      Methods in frc.team670.robot.utils.math with parameters of type RigidTransform 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static RigidTransform Kinematics.integrateForwardKinematics(RigidTransform currentPose, Twist deltaPos)
      Forward kinematics: Starting in the pose (x, y, theta) at time t, determine the pose at time t + delta_t (x', y', theta') given the robot's left and right wheel velocities.
      RigidTransform RigidTransform.transform(RigidTransform other)
      Transforms (rotates + translates) this transformation matrix by another transformation matrix Basically multiplies two transformation matrices (see above the class declaration) together.
